contentList.content: While active you focus on channelling your eldritch magic, using your <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slots</LSTag> before other <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag>.
Spend <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag> to gain <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag>.
Spend a level [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag> to gain [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Point</LSTag>.
Spend a Level [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag> to gain [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag>.
Spend <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag> to unlock a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>
Spend [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag> to unlock a level [2] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Spend [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag> to unlock a level [2] <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slot</LSTag>.
